title: Slayer - Reign in Blood [FLAC]
description:
Likely the fastest, most brutal thrash metal album ever made. Slayer slowed their music down in the album after this because they knew they couldn&#039;t top it. 

Questions about the FLAC format can be answered at http://flac.sourceforge.net/

Please seed ;)
